title: Kore wa Zombie Desu ka? OVA (Is This a Zombie? OVA)
synopsis: Two OVAs released with the 8th and 10th volumes of the original novel. They fall chronologically between the first and second seasons.
related_anime: ['Kore wa Zombie desu ka?', 'Kore wa Zombie Desu ka? of the Dead', 'Kore wa Zombie Desu ka?']
